meanings.definition: Making a rustling or whistling sound.
meanings.sent1: The swishy leaves danced in the wind.
meanings.sent2: Her swishy skirt brushed against the chair as she walked.
meanings.sent3: The swishy sound of the curtains made the room feel alive.
meanings.sent4: The swishy branches of the trees whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent5: The swishy noise of the river was soothing to the ears.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a swishing movement or sound.
meanings.sent1: The swishy tail of the cat flicked back and forth.
meanings.sent2: The swishy motion of the dancer captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The swishy way he walked made him look like a ninja in disguise.
meanings.sent4: The swishy fabric of her dress flowed elegantly as she twirled.
meanings.sent5: The swishy sound of the wind through the trees was like a lullaby.
